about.title: I'm Camille Lavenant,
about.subtitle: Web Developer in Rennes
about.1: After obtaining a research Master's degree in Chinese in 2020, I am currently undergoing professional retraining.
about.2: Following my training in web development, I am now looking for a work-study program to continue in this field.
about.3: I am proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js and React.
about.4: Please do not hesitate to contact me.

sophie.title: Portfolio Sophie Bluel
sophie.content: Creation of a dynamic web page for a photography website with Javascript
sophie.info: Discovery of the Javascript language to create a dynamic page by retrieving user data via forms. Learning how to manipulate the DOM and manage user events.

carducci.title: Portfolio Nina Carducci
carducci.content: Debugging and optimizing a photography website with Lighthouse and Wave
carducci.info: Learning SEO techniques with Lighthouse and Wave. Implementation of file conversion (webp, avi), lazy loading, page accessibility with referencing and meta tags, code minification and debugging.

kasa.title: Kasa
kasa.content: Creation of a real estate rental website with the front-end javascript library React
kasa.info: Learning the React library with development of interface elements using components. Setting up navigation between pages using React Router.

grimoire.title: Mon Vieux Grimoire
grimoire.content: Back-end development of a book rating website with MongoDB, Node.js and Express
grimoire.info: Use of Node.js with Express and Nodemon to create the back-end of the site. Implemented a compliant data model and connected to the database with Mongoose, use of CRUD operations. Securing data storage in MongoDB Atlas and password hashing with bcrypt.

flix.title: Myflix
flix.content: Creation of a media center type movie streaming site
flix.info: This is my new personal project in progress. Inspired by the Netflix style, this project is carried out with the Next.js framework (React & Node), Typescript, Tailwind css, MongoDB, Prisma and Vercel.
